product_name: Jelly Belly Sport Beans Recovery Crisps
long_description: After a long day on the trail or a tough workout in the gym, the Jelly Belly Sport Beans Recovery crisps are the perfect snack to satisfy hunger and help rebuild muscles. Crisps contain 12g of protein per serving to help rebuild muscles after intense exercise. Crisps are made with natural flavors and colors. Jelly Belly Sport Beans Recovery crisps are gluten free, peanut free and kosher. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: After a long day on the trail or a tough workout in the gym, the Jelly Belly Sport Beans Recovery crisps are the perfect snack to satisfy hunger and help rebuild muscles.
